LIT XChange: Traineeships Begin15 September  8PM ‚Äì 9.30PM  ZoomSign up now @www.yntuc.sg/traineeshipsbeginYoung NTUC is delighted to hold our first networking session  LIT XChange: Traineeship Begins. Take this opportunity to meet and connect with fellow SGUnited trainees  get the latest event updates and share with us your experience(s)so far as a Trainee with your host organisation. We want to hear it all from you! And since it‚Äôs our very first gathering  we prepared a special sweet treat for you  successful registrants will receive a $5 GRAB voucher at the end of the session! Limited slots available! In the meanwhile  if you have not followed us on our LIT XChange FB Group yet   do join us (https://www.facebook.com/groups/LITXChange/) to get the latest updates for upcoming events  career resources and more!
